Abstract: This dataset represents the District Revitalization Areas in Washington, DC 2003

    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This dataset represents the District Revitalization Areas in Washington, DC 2003</abstract>
      <purpose>This data is used for the planning and management of Washington by local government agencies.  It is used to delineate, in one location, all those project boundaries that are specific to DC Office of Planning initiatives so that one definitive set is available for map making purposes.</purpose>
    </descript>
    <timeperd>
      <timeinfo>
        <sngdate>
          <caldate>10/02/2003</caldate>
        </sngdate>
      </timeinfo>
      <current>publication date</current>
    </timeperd>
    <status>
      <progress>In work</progress>
      <update>As needed</update>
    </status>

    </spdom>

        <procdesc>Dataset copied from the cd obtained from Washington, DC 2005
